title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.15 - Judges certificate to claim
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.15 - Judges certificate to claim

State Regulations

When a stable has been eliminated by claiming, the owner
so affected, if he has not replenished his stable before the close of the
meeting, may obtain a certificate from the judges of the meeting; and on
presentation thereof the owner shall be entitled to claim during the next 30
racing days at any recognized meeting in this State, until he has claimed a
horse. Stables eliminated by fire or other hazards may also be permitted to
claim under this section at the discretion of the judges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4230.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
